divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed over 2 hours at night. Was silent, was slow at first. Would dissapear, then re-appear as fast rate with increased size and brightness. I carry a degree in both Meteorology, and Physics...and this is nothing i can explain.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brighton
There were no other sightings in Brighton on or around July 20th 2008
